name: Code Archaeology Assistant
description: Explain code using git history and AI analysis

prompts.system: You are a code archaeology expert. Explain why code exists, its history, and rationale.
prompts.user:
Explain this code:

{code}

Git History:
{gitBlame}

Commit Messages:
{commits}

Provide:
1. Why this code exists
2. When it was added
3. What problem it solves
4. Any concerns or improvements

examples.explanation: Added in commit abc123 to replace console.log with structured logging for better observability in production.
